title: Celebrity holiday hot spots: Sam Burgess, Katy Perry, Gisele Bündchen
text:
They’re sailing on luxury yachts off the coast of Greece, hitting the clubs in Miami, lazing on deserted beaches in the Maldives and sipping cocktails in Rio de Janeiro.
We’ve ranked the top 10 current hottest destinations of globetrotting stars.
21 MUST-DO HOLIDAY DESTINATIONS IN 2015
SEVEN HEAVENLY UNKNOWN EUROPEAN HOTSPOTS
Stunning landscape ... rugby league star Sam Burgess enjoys Mykonos, Greece. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
MYKONOS
Lazy days on a white sandy beach or sailing the crystal blue ocean, followed by late evening feasts of fresh seafood and wild dancing in a seaside nightclub.
What’s not to love about this glitzy Greek island?
Locals have enjoyed recent visits from the likes of pop star Katy Perry , rugby league turned rugby union star Sam Burgess and snowboarder Torah Bright .
Private villa ... pop star Katy Perry enjoys the view from her luxury Mykonos pad. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Book a private villa in the hills, offering spectacular views of the ocean, and take your pick of countless restaurants, bars and open-air clubs in the streets below. Rent a scooter to explore the little villages dotted along the coast or charter a yacht to explore hidden alcoves and deserted stretches of beach.
Perfect destination ... Hawaii has something for everyone, from beach and shopping to adventure and night life. Source: Supplied
HAWAII
Hawaii has it all — beach, night-life, incredible shopping and spectacular scenery. Throw in a heavy dose of culture and history, and you’ve got the perfect holiday.
You’ve got the faster-paced excitement of Honolulu , the more relaxed vibe of Maui , the spectacular scenic locale of Kauai, and the awe-inspiring volancoes on the Big Island.
Downtime ... Adam Devine and Zac Efron take a break from filming and hit a watering hole in Hawaii. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Actor and model Teresa Palmer was there recently with her hubby Mark Webber and their son Bodhi. So too was pop brat Justin Bieber and Aussie megastar Hugh Jackman.
And while he’s there filming a movie, hunky actor Zac Efron and co-star Adam Devine are enjoying some downtime.
AMBER ROSE GOES TOPLESS IN MAUI
Secluded spot ... supermodel Gisele Bündchen snaps her hubby Tom Brady with their kids on a quiet beach in Costa Rica Picture: Facebook Source: Supplied
COSTA RICA
It seems Teresa Palmer just can’t get enough of luxury beach getaways. In addition to her recent Hawaii trip, she also spent some time in tropical Costa Rica.
And she’s not alone. This exotic country might be tiny, but there’s no shortage of attractions to keep a long list of celeb visitors busy.
Peaceful spot ... Gisele Bündchen does yoga in Costa Rica. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Family fun ... Teresa Palmer snaps her hubby Mark Webber in Costa Rica. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
For model Gisele Bündchen, it’s the perfect family holiday destination and she was there with her football star hubby Tom Brady and their two kids.
It has wildlife, beaches and breathtaking scenery on offer. It’s one of the most biologically dense spots in the world. For the adventurous, there’s diving, whitewater rafting and mountain hiking.
Endless possibilities ... California’s capital, Los Angeles, has something for everyone. Picture: iStock Source: Supplied
LOS ANGELES
There’s the diverse and colourful Venice Beach, the iconic Walk Of Fame, the uber popular Runyon Canyon, the super cool Santa Monica Pier and the trendy Rodeo Drive.
That’s not to mention the countless — seriously, countless — eateries, bars and clubs that are heaving with stars.
Bike babes ... reality stars Lisa Hyde and Tyson Mayr hit Venice Beach in Los Angeles. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
LA has a bit of something for everyone.
Reality stars and couple Tyson Mayr and Lisa Hyde were there recently and did everything from bike riding along the beach to hitting the tourist hot spots in Hollywood.
Famous faces ... Andy Lee and Rebecca Harding run into TV actor Michael Weatherly. Picture: Twitter Source: Supplied
Pop star Ricki-Lee Coulter is such a fan she apparently wants to move there, while funnyman Andy Lee visited recently.
Maldives magic ... Lindy Klim laps up luxury in the Maldives while on holiday with hubby Michael. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
MALDIVES
You’ll never see a shade of blue quite like the colour of the water in the Maldives. This is tropical beauty at its very best, with countless luxury resorts in which to rest and relax.
It’s a hotspot for Hollywood film stars as well as world-famous supermodels. And some of our favourite stars are big fans too.
Family relaxation ... funnyman Hamish Blake with son Sonny in the Maldives. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Hamish Blake was there recently with his other half Zoe Foster and their adorable bub Sonny, around the same time as former swimmer Michael Klim and his wife Lindy.
Spectacular spot ... it’s a shade of blue unlike any other in the world. Lindy Klim admires the beautiful Maldives. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
It’s peaceful, stunning and a constant 30 degrees year-round. Why wouldn’t you go?
Rio, baby! ... it’s a mix of relaxation and partying in Rio de Janeiro in Brazil. Source: Supplied
RIO DE JANEIRO
As far as party cities go, Rio is right up there — and not just when the famous Carnival is on. This city is pumping most of the time.
Victoria’s Secret star model Alessandra Ambrosio, a Brazilian native, spends a lot of time there, and pop star Nick Carter also paid a visit recently.
One of a kind ... supermodel Alessandra Ambrosio laps up the beautiful Rio de Janeiro. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
If cocktails on the beach, long dinners in hole-in-the-wall restaurants or dancing until the sun comes up sound appealing, you’ll never want to come home.
While it’s a loud and colourful spot, with an incredible night-life, there are plenty of opportunities to relax. And its tropical forests on the city’s outskirts are well worth a look.
In the spotlight ... all eyes were on Italy recently thanks to shock new couple Mariah Carey and James Packer. Source: Supplied
ITALY
It seems like just about every celeb has been in Italy recently, with shock new couple Mariah Carey and James Packer attracting the lion’s share of attention.
The diva and Aussie billionaire spent their whirlwind holiday together with visits to the island of Capri, famous for its beach resorts and upscale shopping, before moving on to the famed harbour village of Portofino.
On the water ... Mariah Carey during her whirlwind romantic getaway with James Packer in Italy. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
When not on dry land, they enjoyed each other’s company on his mega yacht just off the beautiful Italian coast.
This spectacular country has dozens of celeb-favoured hot spots throughout, from the picturesque Lake Como to the historic Rome and Vatican City to name just a few.
What a sight ... model Jennifer Hawkins and her hubby Jake Wall enjoy some fun in the sun in Italy. Picture: Facebook Source: Supplied
Recent visitors have included Jennifer Hawkins and her husband Jake Wall, as well as pop star Delta Goodrem and former model (and Packer’s ex) Jodhi Meares.
Italy boasts beach, city, shopping, culture, history, art, fashion ... the list goes on and on.
BAHAMAS
The order of the day is relaxation and there are plenty of ways to do it, from quiet beaches to seaside bars and restaurants to up-market resort pools.
Being just a short plane trip from the United States, this tropical destination attracts a whole host of celebrities.
Recent visitors include colourful pop star Lady Gaga and European football sensation Cristiano Ronaldo.
Paradise ... pop star Lady Gaga relaxes on a pristine beach in the Bahamas. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
There’s more to the Bahamas than its colourful capital of Nassau, with some 700 islands to explore.
As well as sand and surf, there are also art galleries and museums as well as shopping and adventure sports on offer.
Party time ... socialites Paris and Nicky Hilton with a gaggle of girlfriends in Miami. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
MIAMI
If you want to go where the beautiful young people go, then Miami should be on your list.
Model Shanina Shaik was there recently, soaking up the rays on the beach, while Paris and Nicky Hilton had a few days of partying with their gaggle of girlfriends. Reality star Kylie Jenner is a big fan of some downtime in the city too.
Seaside shenanigans ... model Shanina Shaik in Miami. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Whether you’re into days at the beach, a shopping spree at high-end boutiques, scoping out unique artworks in a pop-up gallery, star spotting at ritzy bars and restaurants, or dancing the night away at a Latin club, there’s always something to do in Miami.
The food is spectacular, the scenery diverse and the people friendly and welcoming.
Romantic getaway ... Nikki Phillips and husband Dane Rumble in Bali. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
BALI
Yes, many of us have spent time in Bali before, but there’s much more to this destination than the regular spots.
If you’re not into the tourist-thick and cramped city full of knock-off handbags and heaving Aussie bars, there’s plenty for you to do.
There are unspoilt spots to explore, like Nusa Penida island, and fascinating mountain villages, like Munduk.
Lazy days ... reality stars Anna Heinrich and Tim Robards relax in Bali. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Just off the beaten track, you’ll find countless activities — detox spas, handicraft markets, peaceful beach resorts, extreme water sports, luxury villas and historic temples.
It’s no wonder the likes of Gemma Ward, Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich, and Nikki Phillips were recent visitors.
